entry.title: The New Rabi monostrap dress
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hertunba
Type: Dress
Price: 145.00

The Rabi monostrap dress: as a Nigerian born and bred designer Florentina constantly draws inspiration from her culture and reality, this piece is strongly inspired by a single wrapper tie she has seen young girls wear to the stream in her mother’s village. The Rabi dress features a single shoulder fit, adding a chic and asymmetrical touch to the design. It showcases a stylish silhouette, with a signature ruched waist detailing which is designed to embrace and enhance your curves making it a fashionable and eye-catching choice for events.

  • Stretchy 
  • Length 58 inches 
  • Handle with care
  • Dry Clean only
  • Double lined mesh
  • 100% upcycled polyester

entry.title: Odachi Kaftan
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hertunba
Type: Dress
Price: 250.00 - 285.00 (4 variants)

Crafted from exquisite Akwette fabric, reflecting the complexity and intricacy of woven threads,  the Odachi kaftan in beige exudes timeless and refined elegance with its loose-fitting silhouette and multiple pockets. 

With attention to detail, the Odachi kaftan features intricate patterns, providing a sophisticated  look. Whether worn for a special occasion or as a statement piece.


  • Dress length: 60 inches
  • Loose fit for ease of movement and a relaxed look
  • 100% cotton
  • Two side pockets
  • Two front pockets
  • Hand made

entry.title: ACHEBE DRESS (blue)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hertunba
Type:
Price: 180.00

The masterpiece tunic crafted from a patchwork of upcycled Akwette fabric is truly remarkable. This creation is a testament to our commitment to minimizing waste in production and embracing sustainable fashion practices. This tunic exudes a sense of responsibility and dedication to sustainable fashion, embracing a loose, comfortable fit with two straps and a dress length of 32 inches.

  • Dress length: 32 inches, ensuring comfort and style
  • Loose fit and two straps for a relaxed and easy-wearing experience
  • open sides
  • Dry clean only
  • Due to its upcycled nature no two Achebe tunics are exactly the same. 
  • Do not soak or bleach

entry.title: Akweke Kaftan in Chalk
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hertunba
Type: Dress
Price: 250.00 - 285.00 (4 variants)

The Akweke Kaftan is a stunning garment crafted from the finest Akweke design, showcasing the artistry and craftsmanship involved in creating this garment.

The kaftan structure is carefully prioritized for comfort, allowing for ease of movement and a relaxed fit. It is designed to drape gracefully on your body, providing a flattering and flowing silhouette.

Whether worn for a special occasion or as a statement piece, this kaftan is sure to make a lasting impression.

  • Dress length: 60 inches
  • Loose fit for ease of movement and a relaxed, elegant look

entry.title: Akweke Kaftan in Uli
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hertunba

The Akweke Kaftan in Uli is an exquisite piece crafted from the finest Akweke design, highlighting the artistry and craftsmanship involved in its creation.

Prioritizing comfort, the kaftan structure allows for ease of movement. It's designed to gracefully drape over your body, creating a flattering and flowing silhouette.

  • Loose fit for ease of movement and a relaxed, elegant look

Vendor: Hertunba
Type: Dress
Price: 250.00

The Onye dress is a stunning garment crafted from Akwete fabric, providing sophistication with its extra loose threads. This look is undeniably stylish for various occasions, seamlessly combining fashion with a tailored length for a versatile and chic appearance. It also showcases our signature threading detail.

  • Dress length: 36 inches
  • Loose fit for ease of movement and a relaxed, elegant look
  • Dry clean only
  • 100% cotton

entry.title: The Oja set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hertunba
Type: Dress
Price: 205.00

The Oja set: a bodice and skirt inspired by African cultural dancers and muted in black. The bodice features a boned corset, Paired with a grungy draped mini skirt,  detailed with eight Epkiri seeds worn by Igbo traditional dancers.

  •  Dry clean only 
  • Model wears a small
  • Fabric offers no stretch

entry.title: The Toni upcycled jacket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hertunba
Type: Dress
Price: 200.00

The Toni jacket:  a sustainable and stylish outerwear piece, upcycled from a dead stock batch of men’s wear and detailed with repurposed akwette and asoke wrappers.. Its rich brown color adds warmth, while the upcycled nature reflects a commitment to environmental consciousness. 

  • Bold padded shoulders 
  • Dry clean only
  • Model wears a medium

entry.title: The Bibi suit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hertunba
Type: Dress
Price: 260.00

The Bibi suit  is made from Akwete fabric presenting  elegance and  African opulence, This suit features the distinctive woven native chalk inspired Akwete patterns , creating a sophisticated look. The design includes a well-tailored double breasted tuxedo and bootcut pants, providing a stylish ensemble that seamlessly blends modern fashion with the rich heritage of Akwete.

  •  Dry clean only 
  • Pant lengh 48
  • Jacket length 31
  • Model wears a small

entry.title: The AMA dress
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hertunba
Type: Dress
Price: 200.00

The AMA dress is crafted from aged linen Akwete fabric, which  boasts a culturally rich and visually striking pattern inspired by native chalk marks. This dress  features a beaded neckline, exaggerated hip curves and a small cleavage cutout With its extended hip the AMA dress will definitely make a statement for all occasions.

  • Dry clean only 
  • Dress length 34
  • Fabric offers no stretch
  • Back zip
  • Corset loops
  • Model wears a small

entry.title: The Omoye draped corset dress
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hertunba
Type: Dress
Price: 195.00

The Omoye draped corset dress is a statement piece that defines elegance. This dress features a halter neckline, with our signature draping technique at the bottom half and a detached corset-style bodice that accentuates the waist, made from soft upcycled cotton, the flattering and sculpted silhouette, makes it a stylish choice for  vacations, shoots, occasions or events where a chic look is desired.

  •  Dry clean only 
  • Dress length 60

entry.title: The Kando Kaftan
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hertunba
Type: Dress
Price: 250.00 - 285.00 (4 variants)

The Kando Kaftan is a stunning blend of traditional craftsmanship and style. With its unique sleeves, the kaftan features the intricate Akwete fabric, renowned for its striking patterns. Designed to be a statement piece, it serves as a wearable work of art, comfortable and captivating in every detail. Sustainably designed for the modern African woman.

  • Dress length: 60 inches
  •  Dry clean only
  • 100% cotton
  • Three pockets
  • Loose silver threads

entry.title: The Muna mini dress
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hertunba
Type: Dress
Price: 200.00

The Muna mini dress: In an ode to our allegiance to culture and sustainability, the Muna mini is crafted from upcycled Akwette and Asoke fabrics, reimagining a piece that has lived many lives before with fresh eyes, giving it a chance to become even more beautiful. Additionally, it features a corset loop detailing at the back to outline your waist and curves. The handwoven gold straps introduce an element of sophisticated elegance, drawing attention to your neck and shoulders.

  • Single back zip 
  • Can be worn as a dress or hung on a wall as art
  • Back zip for ease of wearing 
  • Fabric offers no stretch
  • ⁠Dry clean only
  • Dress length 34 inches
